WorkItem.Description:
When am item is being edited, if I mouse-click on another item, the treeview will exit the edition mode.

However, if I click anywhere else in my application, including a text box that would get the focus, the TreeViewEx item remains in edition mode.
WorkItem.Summary: Exiting edition mode by mouse click works only if I click another item

Comments.Message: NOTE: this might be expected, in Windows Explorer there are several places where you can click while editing a folder name, and the treeview won't exit the edition mode. However then clicking in an empty area of the TreeViewEx control should probably exit the edition mode anyway (the difference between clicking on another item and clicking in an empty space is too subtle to behave differently in my opinion).
